alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Johnson; Newton; Perry; Pope; Searcy; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 1:43AM CDT until June 18 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Newton County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Johnson County in western Arkansas... Northeastern Perry County in central Arkansas... Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Conway County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 142 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dillen to near Hector to near Adona, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Conway... Morrilton... Clinton... Perryville... Greenbrier... Atkins... Pottsville... Wooster... Oppelo... Guy... Hector... Damascus... Twin Groves... Menifee... Perry... Adona... Houston... Bethlehem... Hill Creek... Witts Spring... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Faulkner; Johnson; Newton; Perry; Pope; Searcy; Van Buren
